Entries.Abigail: I really hate dancing in front of everyone... It's so embarrassing.#$e#Mum makes me do it.$u
Entries.Haley: I'm practising my dance moves... It needs to be perfect.#$e#I've been flower queen for the past 5 years and I'm not ready to step off the throne just yet!
Entries.Leo: The flowers here are nice, but they aren't as colourful as back home!$h#$e#I wonder if I'll ever have to get up there and dance...$u
